name: Two-Up: The Australian Gambling Game
overview: A Gambling game that uses three special Two Up dice. The traditional game of Two Up was played with two old Australian Pennies. This version of Two Up uses three Two Up dice each having three heads and three tails. The dice version of Two Up is now played in Casinos World-Wide. Features include: • 3D Dice spinning on screen • Bet on evens - 2 or 3 tails or 2 or 3 heads • Bet on 6 to 1 - all tails or all heads • Bet the whole bank • Hall of fame recording the highest wins • Hall of shame recording worst losses • In-programme and printed instructions
